docs.lead_paragraph: The viral illness killed a man who had traveled to New Jersey from Liberia, where it is common, but it does not carry the threat of Ebola or spread easily from person to person.

headline.main: Lassa Fever Carries Little Risk to Public, Experts Say
headline.print_headline: Another Illness From Afar, but This One Isn’t as Serious

docs.abstract: Answers to basic questions about Lassa fever, which was recently diagnosed in New Jersey man who had visited Liberia.
docs.snippet: The viral illness killed a man who had traveled to New Jersey from Liberia, where it is common, but it does not carry the threat of Ebola or spread easily from person to person.

docs.lead_paragraph: The California State Assembly approved a bill on Tuesday that would require licensed pregnancy centers, which sometimes steer women away from abortion, to inform clients about state programs offering such services, officials said.

headline.main: California Assembly Votes to Make Pregnancy Centers Tell Women of Abortion Option
headline.print_headline: California Assembly Votes to Make Pregnancy Centers Tell Women of Abortion Option

docs.snippet: The California State Assembly approved a bill on Tuesday that would require licensed pregnancy centers, which sometimes steer women away from abortion, to inform clients about state programs offering such services, officials said.

docs.lead_paragraph: A law banning abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy took effect in West Virginia on Tuesday, making the state one of 12 to prohibit abortions after that period.

headline.main: West Virginia's 20-Week Abortion Ban Takes Effect
headline.print_headline: West Virginia's 20-Week Abortion Ban Takes Effect

docs.snippet: A law banning abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy took effect in West Virginia on Tuesday, making the state one of 12 to prohibit abortions after that period.

docs.lead_paragraph: Klara Balogova was 18, penniless and heavily pregnant when she rode thousands of miles from Slovakia to England to marry a man she had never met.

headline.main: Brides for Sale: European Women Lured for Sham Marriages
headline.print_headline: Brides for Sale: European Women Lured for Sham Marriages

docs.snippet: Klara Balogova was 18, penniless and heavily pregnant when she rode thousands of miles from Slovakia to England to marry a man she had never met.

docs.lead_paragraph: Lofty living may make babies vulnerable to sudden infant death syndrome, according to a Colorado study that found higher risks above 8,000 feet (2,400 meters).

headline.main: Study: High Altitude May Boost Babies' Risks for SIDS Deaths
headline.print_headline: Study: High Altitude May Boost Babies' Risks for SIDS Deaths

docs.snippet: Lofty living may make babies vulnerable to sudden infant death syndrome, according to a Colorado study that found higher risks above 8,000 feet (2,400 meters).

docs.lead_paragraph: German media report that a 65-year-old teacher from Berlin has given birth to quadruplets.

headline.main: German Woman, 65, Gives Birth to Quadruplets
headline.print_headline: German Woman, 65, Gives Birth to Quadruplets

docs.snippet: German media report that a 65-year-old teacher from Berlin has given birth to quadruplets.

docs.lead_paragraph: Spiritual awareness is innate, and it is an important component in human development.
docs.abstract: David Brooks Op-Ed column praises Lisa Miller book The Spiritual Child, which makes case that spiritual awareness is innate and should be considered integral part of development; suggests cultivation of spiritual awareness should be part of public education, particularly as it may have positive impact on education, social mobility and depression, particularly for adolescents.
docs.snippet: Spiritual awareness is innate, and it is an important component in human development.

docs.lead_paragraph: The French Open could prove to be a high-profile test for the closely watched partnership between Amélie Mauresmo and Andy Murray.

headline.main: Mauresmo Tries to Guide Murray to the Prize That Eluded Her

docs.abstract: Christopher Clarey On Tennis column notes that Andy Murray's coach Amelie Mauresmo is hoping to steer him to his first French Open title, championship that evaded Mauresmo during her playing career.
docs.snippet: The French Open could prove to be a high-profile test for the closely watched partnership between Amélie Mauresmo and Andy Murray.
